historic.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a historic place or building is very old
historic.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a historic event or act is very important and will be recorded as part of history
historic.translation[0].definitions[1].e: a historic meeting of world leaders
‘It is a historic moment, ’ he told journalists.
historic.translation[0].definitions[2].d: having taken place or existed in the past
historic.translation[0].definitions[2].e: It’s unlikely that the share price will exceed historic levels.
historic.translation[0].definitions[3].d: historic times are the periods of time whose history has been recorded
historic.translation[0].definitions[3].e: Extinct volcanoes are those that have not erupted in historic times.
